decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (28261101-TW-PL01 Rev R2, 28261101-TW-PL02 Rev R6, 28261101-TW-PL03 Rev R3, 28261101-TW-PL04 Rev R1, L140112-111 Rev E (received 14/07/14), lighting specification, L140112-119 Rev A, L140112-311 Rev A (received 12/09/14)) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 2 - Within 12 months of the date of this permission the building, hardstanding and fencing hereby approved shall be removed from the site and the ground returned to grass.

Condition : 3 - No external alarm system attached to the building hereby approved shall be used to indicate the start and end of lessons or the start or end of break times and any external alarm system shall only be used in the case of emergencies.
Condition : 4 - Other than as specified in the application, no external lighting shall be installed without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - Within 3 calendar months of the date of this permission, the cycle parking shall be implemented in accordance with the application.  This shall be retained for as long as the development remains in existence.

Condition : 6 - Within 3 months of the date of this permission an updated Travel Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The measures contained within the approved Travel Plan shall be implemented in accordance with the approved details.
description: Erection of a temporary single storey modular building for 1 year for use as a Special Educational Needs School
